mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGINLOG ( "login_log_Id", "connection_id", "connection_ip", "connection_os", "connection_browser", "error_occurrence_cd", "error_code", "login_occurrence_date" ) VALUES (loginlog_seq.NEXTVAL, #{connectionId}, #{connectionIp}, #{connectionOs}, #{connectionBrowser}, CASE WHEN #{errorOccurrenceCd} = 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END, NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'))
